channel.title: Comments on: HOVERFLY XL Off Road Hoverboard

item.title: By: TRAX
item.dc:creator: TRAX
item.description: They're super fun! And the UL 2272 certification makes them super safe too!
item.content:encoded: They’re super fun! And the UL 2272 certification makes them super safe too!

item.title: By: debilev
item.dc:creator: debilev
item.description: Would love to try this it looks like fun and I like that its safety certified
item.content:encoded: Would love to try this it looks like fun and I like that its safety certified

item.title: By: Luy
item.dc:creator: Luy
item.description: I can't wait to try this. Love ELECTRICAL SAFETY CERTIFIED and the 5 star review. I also love those Rugged 8" tires
item.content:encoded: I can’t wait to try this. Love ELECTRICAL SAFETY CERTIFIED and the 5 star review. I also love those Rugged 8″ tires

item.title: By: Karen W.
item.dc:creator: Karen W.
item.description: The Hoverfly XL is a perfect birthday present for a 13-year-old. My son absolutely loves his!
item.content:encoded: The Hoverfly XL is a perfect birthday present for a 13-year-old. My son absolutely loves his!

item.title: By: LouBoo82
item.dc:creator: LouBoo82
item.description: Great attention to detail on this hover board. Wish the board had more cartoons on it but my kids like it alot so far. Great product great price.
item.content:encoded: Great attention to detail on this hover board. Wish the board had more cartoons on it but my kids like it alot so far. Great product great price.

item.title: By: Jack Gates
item.dc:creator: Jack Gates
item.description: Solid construction, durable tires, good speakers. Overall a solid purchase.
item.content:encoded: Solid construction, durable tires, good speakers. Overall a solid purchase.

item.title: By: Stan
item.dc:creator: Stan
item.description: feels like riding a monster truck! it's strong and fast, but still just as easy to ride as the original.
item.content:encoded: feels like riding a monster truck! it’s strong and fast, but still just as easy to ride as the original.

item.title: By: William T
item.dc:creator: William T
item.description: Definitely made for exploring. This thing is less of a toy and more of a vehicle, but still fun for the whole family.
item.content:encoded: Definitely made for exploring. This thing is less of a toy and more of a vehicle, but still fun for the whole family.
